dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, um, Super Tuesday, right? What a rollercoaster!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, um, Super Tuesday, right? What a rollercoaster!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, absolutely. I mean, everyone was sort of expecting Biden to, like, continue his surge, you know, after Iowa.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, absolutely. I mean, everyone was sort of expecting Biden to, like, continue his surge, you know, after Iowa.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The former vice president, whose campaign appeared to be on life support just weeks ago after a poor showing in Iowa, was resurgent across several key states...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? But it just totally collapsed. He lost nine states! Nine!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? But it just totally collapsed. He lost nine states! Nine!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Biden wins nine states: The former vice president, whose campaign appeared to be on life support just weeks ago after a poor showing in Iowa, was resurgent across several key states...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I mean, the article says he solidified his collapse. That's pretty brutal. And losing Texas to Sanders, with only 30%? That was a huge upset.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I mean, the article says he solidified his collapse. That's pretty brutal. And losing Texas to Sanders, with only thirty percent? That was a huge upset.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Joe Biden solidified his comeback in the Democratic race... and is projected to win the key state of Texas over favourite Bernie Sanders, with 30% of the vote, a narrow lead over Sanders 28.3%.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Unbelievable, considering how much time he spent campaigning there. And, uh, it wasn't just Texas. He lost Arkansas, Alabama, Minnesota...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unbelievable, considering how much time he spent campaigning there. And, uh, it wasn't just Texas. He lost Arkansas, Alabama, Minnesota...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He also won in Arkansas, Alabama, Massachusetts, Oklahoma, Minnesota and Tennessee, but spent little to no time campaigning in those states, instead focusing on North Carolina and Virginia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And apparently, he really struggled with, like, black and older voters, which is usually his base. That's a huge red flag.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And apparently, he really struggled with, like, black and older voters, which is usually his base. That's a huge red flag.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He was particularly successful among black and older voters.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. But then you have Bloomberg, who, I mean, he just came out of nowhere, didn't he?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. But then you have Bloomberg, who, I mean, he just came out of nowhere, didn't he?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Came out of nowhere *and* won every single state he was on the ballot for! That's insane.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Came out of nowhere and won every single state he was on the ballot for! That's insane.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In contrast, Bloombergs Super Tuesday efforts fell short: The former New York Mayor failed to win any state...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he didn't even run ads or, like, participate in the early debates. It was his first time on the ballot!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he didn't even run ads or, like, participate in the early debates. It was his first time on the ballot!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...despite betting on Super Tuesday with the biggest spend on adverts, and after entering the Democratic race late and bypassing the first debates.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know, it's just wild. And then Warren, she had a good night too, winning her home state in Massachusetts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, it's just wild. And then Warren, she had a good night too, winning her home state in Massachusetts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Warren also slips away, loses in her home state: Warren's loss in Massachusetts indicates a drop in support within her core support groups...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, showing strength with, you know, women and college-educated voters. Really unifying progressives, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, showing strength with, you know, women and college-educated voters. Really unifying progressives, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Warren's loss in Massachusetts indicates a drop in support within her core support groups: women, liberal voters and white, college educated voters. Some have accused her of splitting the vote among progressives...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, um, Sanders, though, he's projected to lose California, which is the big prize, right? So many delegates.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, um, Sanders, though, he's projected to lose California, which is the big prize, right? So many delegates.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sanders is projected to take California: The Golden State is the plum prize, with 415 delegates on the table...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. And he even lost his home state of Vermont too, which is, like, a bit of a shocker.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. And he even lost his home state of Vermont too, which is, like, a bit of a shocker.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sanders took his home state of Vermont, as well as Utah and Colorado.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but he still has that strong support among Latino and younger voters, and turnout was really high for them this time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but he still has that strong support among Latino and younger voters, and turnout was really high for them this time.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sanders is more popular among Latino and younger voters, but turnout among the latter fell short, even below 2016 levels.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, basically, a complete shake-up. And get this, stock futures even dropped because of all the uncertainty.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, basically, a complete shake-up. And get this, stock futures even dropped because of all the uncertainty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Biden's win boosted U.S. stock futures, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average rising more than 2% on Wednesday morning, while S&P 500-linked futures also rose 2%.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. Talk about impact. Super Tuesday really delivered some unexpected twists, didn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. Talk about impact. Super Tuesday really delivered some unexpected twists, didn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. The Democratic race just got a whole lot more interesting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. The Democratic race just got a whole lot more interesting.
